# Carga de ficheros local

```{r}
df = read.table("../../data/bulls.dat",
                header = FALSE,
                col.names = c("breed", "sale_price", "shoulder",
                              "fat_free", "percent_ff", "frame_scale",
                              "back_fat", "sale_height", "sale_weight"),
                sep = "", dec = ".")
head(df)
```
